example.text: 5 Years Ago GOP denies NMC grads college options After a 13-hour markup on Tuesday, the Education and the Workforce Committee passed a reauthorization of the Higher Education Act, HR 4508 . Approved along strict party lines, the "Promoting Real Opportunity, Success, and Prosperity through Education Reform (PROSPER) Act" will make college more expensive and gives for-profits unprecedented access to student aid funds.

Regular consultations on federal issues that began with the election of Gov. Palacios continued in DC. The Governor was here with Speaker Villagomez. Now is a particularly challenging time for the NMI, when it's more important than ever that your elected leaders work together. [[url]]

And that is why I am strongly opposed to the Trump Federal Communications Commission plan that will allow internet service providers to intentionally slow down content they do not want you to see or make it more expensive. 10 Years Ago Millions in unspent federal funds available to fix local roads At my request, the Federal Highway Administration has confirmed that, as of November 29, 2012, the Commonwealth has $28.7 million available to fix roads and for other highway improvements.
Thank you and congratulations, Guam-Northern Marianas ESGR! 1 Year Ago " account of sex."

5 Years Ago Pacific reps work on compact impact The Marianas and other US insular areas should not be saddled with the costs of US foreign policy. That is why I joined my colleague Madeleine Z Bordallo (D-Guam) and Hawai'i representatives Colleen Hanabusa (D) and Tulsi Gabbard (D) to introduce the Compact Impact Relief Act .
